name: SECURITY: Resolve ID Leaks in Path Parameters
description: The current Item API leaks internal database IDs in URLs (e.g., /api/items/1). This allows for easy scraping. Implement a secure HashID implementation for all outbound URLs. The Red Test must prove that a raw integer ID fails to resolve on the new secure endpoints.
expected_behavior: IDs in URLs are obfuscated (e.g., /api/items/aB3x9z). Original integer IDs remain in the internal DB schema.
